state: Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, make an attempt to move north. Then, attempt to travel north. Then, take a trip east. Then, take a trip south. With that done, take a trip south. And then, head west. Okay, and then, take a trip north. With that over with, make an attempt to head north. Then, go to the east. After that, attempt to venture east. Then, make an attempt to move south. After that, make an effort to move east. Once you finish that, go to the north. Then, make an effort to head east. Then, retrieve the coin from the floor of the dish-pit. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Workshop =- You arrive in a workshop. An usual kind of place. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Workshop =-0/1
